entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning.
